DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I Clinical Study , Randomized , Single-blind , Placebo-controlled , Single Dose Escalation Study Safety , Tolerabiluty , Pharmacokinetics HX-1171 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Adult male age 20 40 year screen . Be able comply requirement study . Subject must provide write informed consent prior study participation . History presence liver , kidney , nervous system disease , respiratory disorder , endocrinological disorder , hematooncologic , cardiovascular psychiatric gastrointestinal disorder . History known hypersensitivity drug include HX1171 .
